text: Luís Carlos Almeida da Cunha (born 17 November 1986), commonly known as Nani (), is a Portuguese professional footballer who plays as a winger for Primeira Liga club Estrela da Amadora. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League League League National CupIncludes Taça de Portugal, FA Cup, Turkish Cup, Copa del Rey, Coppa Italia, U.S. Open Cup and Australia Cup.
